category.name: Change Management
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CM_automate_derive_propagation
preference.preference_description: Automates the propagation of relations from source to derived objects for a derive change operation. Valid Values: * true: For a derive change operation, relations are propagated from source to derived objects. This is the default value. * false: For a derive change operation, relations are not propagated from source to derived objects.
